mapper.insert: INSERT INTO NOTIFICATION (USERNAME, TYPE, TITLE, MESSAGE, LINK, IS_READ, CREATED_AT) VALUES (#{username}, #{type}, #{title}, #{message}, #{link}, #{isRead, typeHandler=com.boot.util.BooleanYNTypeHandler}, #{createdAt})
mapper.select: SELECT ID, USERNAME, TYPE, TITLE, MESSAGE, LINK, IS_READ, CREATED_AT FROM NOTIFICATION WHERE USERNAME = #{username} ORDER BY CREATED_AT DESC
